title: Priority in courts
context: [ยง342P-34] Priority in courts. All actions brought pursuant to this chapter, the rules adopted under this chapter, or the conditions of a permit issued under this chapter, at the discretion of the court, shall receive priority in the courts of the State. [L 1991, c 219, pt of ยง1] Note The amendment made by L 2014, c 218, ยง8 is not included in this section.
